alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 7:17PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Emanuel, northeastern Treutlen and south central Johnson Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 717 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Blackville, or 8 miles north of Soperton, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Adrian, Norristown Junction, Covena, Blackville, Norristown, Gillis Springs and Scott. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
